General.Name: Connexa Sports Technologies Inc. Common Stock
General.Description: Connexa Sports Technologies Inc. operates as a sports company. It delivers products, technologies, and services across the watch, play, learn, and subscription-as-a-service activities in sports. The company was formerly known as Slinger Bag Inc. and changed its name to Connexa Sports Technologies Inc. in May 2022. Connexa Sports Technologies Inc. is based in Windsor Mill, Maryland.
General.Address: 2709 North Rolling Road, Windsor Mill, MD, United States, 21244
